dict.string:
# `date` # ${1:$TM_FULLNAME}
set x size 5 set y size 5 set y margin 20 set x axis 0 1 0.25 set y axis 0 20 10 set font size 0 \\background_color = "hsb 0.6 0.2 1.0" \\line_color = "red" \\word_color = "rgb 0.0 0.1 0.6"
read columns x y 0.0 12.5 0.25 19 0.5 12 0.75 15 1 13
draw axes none set color \\background_color set line width axis rapidograph 6 draw curve filled to ..ybottom.. y set color black #draw axes frame
set color \\line_color set line width 10 draw curve
set color \\word_color set font size 100 set font to Helvetica draw label "Gri" at 0.05 1.3
